data.name: Archery Range
data.description: Produces ranged infantry units.

variations.name: Archery Range
variations.description: Produces ranged infantry units.
variations.descriptionCN: 生产远程步兵单位。
influences:
Buildings within influence gain +5 Fire Armor.
Structures built within House of Wisdom influence area help progress to the Golden Age and unlock additional bonuses.
influencesCN:
影响范围内的建筑火焰护甲 +5。
在智慧宫影响范围内建造的建筑可以帮助加快进入黄金时代的进度，并解锁额外的加成。

variations.name: Archery Range
variations.description:
Produces ranged infantry units.
Generates tax each time a unit or research is produced.
variations.descriptionCN:
生产远程步兵单位。

variations.name: Archery Range

influences: The research rate of buildings within influence of a Mosque, Madrasa, or Dock is increased for each garrisoned Scholar. Research speeds are boosted globally for each Scholar garrisoned in these buildings.
influencesCN: 每多驻扎一名学者，清真寺、穆斯林学塾或码头影响范围内建筑的研究速度就会提高。在这些建筑中驻扎的每个学者的研究速度都会得到全面提升。

data.name: Capital Town Center
data.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Capital Town Centers can detect units stealth or disguises.

variations.name: Capital Town Center
variations.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Capital Town Centers can detect units stealth or disguises.
variations.descriptionCN:
可在此存放所有资源。可生产村民、侦察兵，并提高人口上限。单位驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
首都城镇中心可侦测匿踪或伪装单位。

variations.name: Capital Town Center
variations.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Network of Castles: Nearby enemies trigger an alarm that increases defenders' attack speed.
Capital Town Centers can detect units stealth or disguises.
variations.descriptionCN:
可在此存放所有资源。可生产村民、侦察兵，并提高人口上限。单位驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
城堡网络：附近的敌人会触发警报，从而加快守军的攻击速度。
首都城镇中心可侦测匿踪或伪装单位。

data.name: House of Wisdom
data.description:
Contains civilization technology for the Abbasid Dynasty.
Abbasids advance in Ages through the House of Wisdom. Construct wings to advance to the next Age and gain additional technology.

variations.name: House of Wisdom
variations.description:
Contains civilization technology for the Abbasid Dynasty.
Abbasids advance in Ages through the House of Wisdom. Construct wings to advance to the next Age and gain additional technology.
variations.descriptionCN:
包含黑衣大食王朝的文明科技。
黑衣大食通过智慧宫来发展到下一个时代。建造各座偏殿以发展到下一个时代并获得额外的科技。
influences:
Buildings within influence gain +5 Fire Armor.
Structures built within House of Wisdom influence area help progress to the Golden Age and unlock additional bonuses.
influencesCN:
影响范围内的建筑火焰护甲 +5。
在智慧宫影响范围内建造的建筑可以帮助加快进入黄金时代的进度，并解锁额外的加成。

variations.name: House of Wisdom
variations.description:
Contains civilization technology for the Ayyubid Dynasty.
Ayyubids advance in Ages through the House of Wisdom. Construct wings to advance to the next Age and gain additional technology.
Wing bonuses improve based on the Age they were built.
variations.descriptionCN:
包含阿尤布王朝的文明科技。
阿尤布通过智慧宫来发展到下一个时代。建造各座偏殿以发展到下一个时代并获得额外的科技。
偏殿奖励基于其建造的时代而提高。

在智慧宫影响范围内建造的建筑可以帮助加快进入黄金时代的进度，并解锁额外的加成。

variations.name: Keep
variations.description: Heavy garrison and defensible position. Can be upgraded with weaponry. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
variations.descriptionCN: 坚实的驻军及防御地点。可进行武器升级。单位驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
influences: The research rate of buildings within influence of a Mosque, Madrasa, or Dock is increased for each garrisoned Scholar. Research speeds are boosted globally for each Scholar garrisoned in these buildings.
influencesCN: 每多驻扎一名学者，清真寺、穆斯林学塾或码头影响范围内建筑的研究速度就会提高。在这些建筑中驻扎的每个学者的研究速度都会得到全面提升。

variations.name: Keep
variations.description:
Heavy garrison and defensible position. Can be upgraded with weaponry. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Network of Castles Bonus: Triggers an alarm when an enemy approaches, causing nearby units to fire faster while the alarm is active.
variations.descriptionCN:
坚实的驻军及防御地点。可进行武器升级。单位驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
城堡网络加成：敌人接近时会触发警报，警报生效期间附近的单位射击速度会加快。

variations.name: Keep
variations.description: Heavy garrison and defensible position. Can be upgraded with weaponry. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
variations.descriptionCN: 坚实的驻军及防御地点。可进行武器升级。单位驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
influences: Archery Range and Stable unit costs reduced by -20%.
influencesCN: 靶场和马厩单位的成本降低  -20%。

variations.name: Keep
variations.description:
Heavy garrison and defensible position. Can be upgraded with weaponry. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Prelates can place a Relic within to generate Gold and improve the buildings armor, damage, weapon range and sight range.
variations.descriptionCN:
坚实的驻军及防御地点。可进行武器升级。单位驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
高级教士可以在其中放置圣物，使其产生黄金并提升建筑的护甲、武器攻击范围和视野范围。
influences: Buildings gain the Emergency Repairs ability while within the influence of a Town Center.
influencesCN: 城镇中心影响范围内的建筑将获得紧急修理能力。

variations.name: Keep
variations.description:
Heavy garrison and defensible position. Can be upgraded with weaponry. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Grants 3 Earl's Guards upon being fully constructed.
variations.descriptionCN:
重兵驻守，易守难攻。可进行武器升级。单位驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
建造完成后可获得 3 名伯爵护卫。

data.description:

Constructing the Mill near Berry Bushes increases the amount of Food available by +100.

variations.name: Mill
variations.description: Villagers can drop off Food at this building. Houses technologies to improve Food gathering. Byzantine Villagers generate Olive Oil equal to 50% of Food from Berry Bushes, 10% from Fish, and 20% from Olive Groves.
variations.descriptionCN: 村民可将食物存放于这座建筑内。可研究提升食物采集效率的科技。拜占庭村民产生的橄榄油相当于从浆果丛采集的 50% 食物，捕鱼时采集的 10% 食物，以及从橄榄树林采集的 20% 食物。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.
influencesCN: 蓄水池影响范围内，建筑产出增加。

variations.descriptionCN: 生产宗教单位并可研究宗教科技。从城堡时代 (第三时代) 开始，宗教单位可拾取圣物并将其放置在此建筑中以产生黄金。

data.name: Outpost
data.description: Offers extensive line of sight and detects units stealth or disguises. Can be upgraded with weaponry and fortifications. Attacks while garrisoned.

variations.name: Outpost
variations.description: Offers extensive line of sight and detects units stealth or disguises. Can be upgraded with weaponry and fortifications. Attacks while garrisoned.
variations.descriptionCN: 可提供开阔的视野，侦测匿踪或伪装单位。可以升级武器和防御工事。单位驻扎时可进行攻击。
influences:
Buildings within influence gain +5 Fire Armor.
Structures built within House of Wisdom influence area help progress to the Golden Age and unlock additional bonuses.
influencesCN:
影响范围内的建筑火焰护甲 +5。
在智慧宫影响范围内建造的建筑可以帮助加快进入黄金时代的进度，并解锁额外的加成。

variations.name: Outpost
variations.description:
Offers extensive line of sight and detects units stealth or disguises. Can be upgraded with weaponry and fortifications. Attacks while garrisoned.
Network of Castles Bonus: Triggers an alarm when an enemy approaches, causing nearby units and defensive buildings to fire faster while the alarm is active.
variations.descriptionCN:
可提供开阔的视野，侦测匿踪或伪装单位。可以升级武器和防御工事。单位驻扎时可进行攻击。
城堡网络加成：敌人接近时会触发警报，警报生效期间附近的单位和防御型建筑射击速度会加快。

variations.name: Outpost
variations.description: Offers extensive line of sight and detects units stealth or disguises. Can be upgraded with weaponry and fortifications. Attacks while garrisoned.
variations.descriptionCN: 可提供开阔的视野，侦测匿踪或伪装单位。可以升级武器和防御工事。单位驻扎时可进行攻击。

variations.name: Outpost
variations.description:
Offers extensive line of sight and detects units stealth or disguises. Can be upgraded with weaponry and fortifications. Attacks while garrisoned. 
Prelates can place a Relic within to generate Gold and improve the buildings armor, damage, weapon range and sight range.
variations.descriptionCN:
可提供开阔的视野，侦测匿踪或伪装单元。可升级武器和防御工事。单位驻扎时可进行攻击。
高级教士可以在其中放置圣物，使其产生黄金并提升建筑的护甲、伤害、武器攻击范围和视野范围。
influences: Buildings gain the Emergency Repairs ability while within the influence of a Town Center.
influencesCN: 城镇中心影响范围内的建筑将获得紧急修理能力。

variations.name: Outpost
variations.description:
Light garrison and defensible position.
Extensive line of sight and detects units stealth or disguises.
Can be upgraded with weaponry.
Yam: Increases the speed of nearby Cavalry and Traders.
variations.descriptionCN:
简单的驻军及防守位置。
视野开阔，可侦测匿踪或伪装单位。
可升级武器。
驿站：提升附近骑兵和商人的速度。

data.name: Stone Wall
data.description:
Sturdy wall that cannot be attacked by torches. 
Units on walls take 25% less damage from ranged attacks, 50% less damage from siege attacks, and their range is increased by +1.

variations.name: Stone Wall
variations.description:
Sturdy wall that cannot be attacked by torches.

城墙上的单位受到远程攻击的伤害 -25%，攻城攻击的伤害 -50%，并且它们的射程 +1。

data.name: Town Center
data.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Non-Capital Town Centers can't detect stealth or disguises.

variations.name: Town Center
variations.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Non-Capital Town Centers can't detect stealth or disguises.
variations.descriptionCN:
可在此存放所有资源。可生产村民、侦察兵，并提高人口上限。单位驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
非首都城镇中心无法侦测匿踪或伪装。
influences:
Buildings within influence gain +5 Fire Armor.
Structures built within House of Wisdom influence area help progress to the Golden Age and unlock additional bonuses.
influencesCN:
影响范围内的建筑火焰护甲 +5。
在智慧宫影响范围内建造的建筑可以帮助加快进入黄金时代的进度，并解锁额外的加成。

在此存放的所有资源均会额外获得大象经济加成。可生产村民、侦察兵、工作大象，并能提高人口上限。驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
非首都城镇中心不能侦测匿踪或伪装。

variations.name: Town Center
variations.description:
All Resources can be dropped off here. Produces Villagers, Scouts, Officials, and increases your maximum Population. Adds additional attacks while garrisoned.
Non-Capital Town Centers can't detect stealth or disguises.
variations.descriptionCN:
可在此存放所有资源。可生产村民、侦察兵和命官，并提高人口上限。单位驻扎时可增加额外的攻击次数。
非首都城镇中心无法侦测匿踪或伪装。

data.name: Aqueduct
data.description: Stone infrastructure to connect water between Cisterns to improve the Water Level of all connected Cisterns. Can be connected to Stone Walls.

variations.name: Aqueduct
variations.description: Stone infrastructure to connect water between Cisterns to improve the Water Level of all connected Cisterns. Can be connected to Stone Walls.
variations.descriptionCN: 石砌基础设施可以连接蓄水池之间的水，从而提高所有相连蓄水池的水位。可以与石墙相连接。

data.name: Cathedral of Divine Wisdom
data.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.

variations.name: Cathedral of Divine Wisdom
variations.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.
variations.descriptionCN: 建造并守护世界奇观可以获得胜利。敌方文明会察觉并设法摧毁你的世界奇观。

variations.name: Cathedral of Divine Wisdom
variations.description: Build and defend a Wonder to secure victory. Rival civilizations will be aware of its construction and seek to destroy it.
variations.descriptionCN: 建造并守护世界奇观可以获得胜利。敌方文明会察觉并设法摧毁你的世界奇观。

data.name: Cistern
data.description:
Improves the gather rate of nearby villagers by +10/14/18/22/26% depending on network level. Generates influence that boosts production, research or defense. Can activate Arkitoi Defense to briefly arm nearby Villagers. 
Connect Cisterns with Aqueducts to enhance their influence and villager gather rate aura.

variations.name: Cistern
variations.description:
Improves the gather rate of nearby villagers by +10/14/18/22/26% depending on network level. Generates influence that boosts production, research or defense. Can activate Arkitoi Defense to briefly arm nearby Villagers. 
Connect Cisterns with Aqueducts to enhance their influence and villager gather rate aura.
variations.descriptionCN:
根据网络等级，附近村民的采集速率 +10/14/18/22/26%。产生影响力，提升生产、研究或防御。可激活阿克里人防御，使附近村民快速武装起来。
将蓄水池连接到水渠，可强化它们的影响力和村民采集速率光环。

data.name: Cistern of the First Hill
data.description:
Acts as a Cistern. Unlocks the Pilgrim Flask ability on non-siege military units, which can be activated to increase health regeneration by 25 per second for 6 seconds.
Flasks refill every 30 seconds to a maximum of 20 active flasks.

variations.name: Cistern of the First Hill
variations.description:
Acts as a Cistern. Unlocks the Pilgrim Flask ability on non-siege military units, which can be activated to increase health regeneration by 25 per second for 6 seconds.
Flasks refill every 30 seconds to a maximum of 20 active flasks.
variations.descriptionCN:
可作为蓄水池使用。解锁朝圣者之瓶能力，用于非攻城类军事单位，激活后每秒恢复的生命值增加 25，持续 6 秒。
瓶子每 30 秒充能一次，最多充能至 20 次。
displayClassesCN: 第三时代 - 影响地标

variations.name: Cistern of the First Hill
variations.description:
Charges an ability used for boosting the work rate of military and research buildings. If used on a Mining Camp, Lumber Camp, or Farm, begin earning 160 Gold, Wood, or Food over 60 seconds.
Holds 9 charges.
variations.descriptionCN:
充能一项用于提升军事和研究建筑工作速率的能力。如果是对采矿场、伐木场或农田使用，则开始赚取 160 黄金、木材或食物，持续 60 秒。
保持 9 充能。
displayClassesCN: 第三时代：支持与经济地标

data.name: Foreign Engineering Company
data.description: Allows production of Nest of Bees, Huihui Pao, and Royal Cannons with Olive Oil. Mercenaries receive various unique technologies from their original civilization.

variations.name: Foreign Engineering Company
variations.description: Allows production of Nest of Bees, Huihui Pao, and Royal Cannons with Olive Oil. Mercenaries receive various unique technologies from their original civilization.
variations.descriptionCN: 允许用橄榄油生产一窝蜂、回回炮和皇家加农炮。雇佣兵会从其原来的文明中获得各种独特的科技。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.
influencesCN: 蓄水池影响范围内，建筑产出增加。

variations.name: Foreign Engineering Company
variations.description: Allows production of Nest of Bees, Huihui Pao, and Royal Cannons for Silver.
variations.descriptionCN: 允许使用白银生产一窝蜂、回回炮和皇家加农炮。

data.name: Golden Horn Tower
data.description: Periodically produces unlocked Mercenary Units for free.

variations.name: Golden Horn Tower
variations.description: Periodically produces unlocked Mercenary Units for free.
variations.descriptionCN: 定期免费生产已解锁的雇佣兵单位。

variations.name: Golden Horn Tower
variations.description:
Defensive building equipped with Crossbow emplacements and large Line of Sight. Generates batches of Crossbowman for free over time. 
Detects units in stealth or disguises.
variations.descriptionCN:
防御建筑，配备弩炮台并拥有广阔视野。随时间推移免费生成一批批弩手。
可侦测处于匿踪或伪装状态下的单位。

data.name: Grand Winery
data.description: Acts as a Mill and Monastery. Nearby Villagers gather +60% Olive Oil from Berry Bushes and Olive Groves. Relics garrisoned generate Olive Oil instead of Gold.

variations.name: Grand Winery
variations.description: Acts as a Mill and Monastery. Nearby Villagers gather +60% Olive Oil from Berry Bushes and Olive Groves. Relics garrisoned generate Olive Oil instead of Gold.
variations.descriptionCN: 可作为磨坊和修道院使用。附近的村民从浆果丛和橄榄树林中采集的橄榄油 +60%。保管的圣物产生橄榄油而不是黄金。
displayClassesCN: 第二时代 - 经济与宗教地标
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.
influencesCN: 蓄水池影响范围内，建筑产出增加。

variations.name: Grand Winery
variations.description: Acts as a Mill and Monastery. Villagers gather Food 30% faster when affected by its aura. Relics garrisoned generate Silver instead of Gold.
variations.descriptionCN: 可兼作磨坊和修道院使用。在受其光环影响时，村民采集食物速度 +30%。驻守的圣物可产生白银而不是黄金。
displayClassesCN: 第二时代 - 经济与宗教地标

data.name: Imperial Hippodrome
data.description:
Acts as a Stable. Contains the Triumph ability that can be activated with Supply Points to increase cavalry melee damage, move speed, and health regeneration. 
Comes with 10 Supply Points and generates one every 25 seconds. Earn more points by defeating enemy units.

variations.name: Imperial Hippodrome
variations.description:
Acts as a Stable. Contains the Triumph ability that can be activated with Supply Points to increase cavalry melee damage, move speed, and health regeneration. 
Comes with 10 Supply Points and generates one every 25 seconds. Earn more points by defeating enemy units.
variations.descriptionCN:
可作为马厩使用。具备凯旋能力，可使用补给点激活，以增加骑兵近战伤害、移动速度和生命值恢复效果。
自带 10 个补给点，并且每 25 秒产生一个。击败敌方单位可获取更多点数。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.
influencesCN: 蓄水池影响范围内，建筑产出增加。

variations.name: Imperial Hippodrome
variations.description:
Acts as a Stable. A powerful Champion Scout, Horseman, and Riddari are trained for free over time.
Champions provide auras that increase damage of torches, enhance damage of cavalry, and inspire infantry to move faster.
variations.descriptionCN:
可作为马厩使用。随着时间的推移，可免费训练强大的精锐侦察兵、骑手和瑞塔利。
精锐提供的光环可以增加火把的伤害，增强骑兵的伤害，并激励步兵更快地移动。

data.name: Mercenary House
data.description:
Produces Mercenary units for Olive Oil after purchasing a Mercenary Contract. One contract can be purchased.
Unlock another set of Mercenaries with +50% production speed by placing this building near a Trade Post.

variations.name: Mercenary House

variations.descriptionCN:

此外，将该建筑物放置在贸易站附近，还可以解锁另一组雇佣兵，使其生产速度提高 +50%。
influences: Building output is improved while within the influence of a Cistern.
influencesCN: 蓄水池影响范围内，建筑产出增加。

data.name: Ovoo
data.description:
Must be built on a Stone Outcropping.
Harvests 60 Stone per minute even from Depleted Stone Deposits. Build limit is increased by +1 after each age up.

variations.name: Ovoo
variations.description:
Must be built on a Stone Outcropping.
Harvests 60 Stone per minute even from Depleted Stone Deposits. Build limit is increased by +1 after each age up.
variations.descriptionCN:
必须建造在石料露头上。
每分钟甚至从枯竭的石料存放点收获 60 石料。每次进入新时代后，建造上限 +1。

variations.name: Ovoo
variations.description:
Must be built on a Stone Outcropping.
Harvests 70/100/120/150 Stone per minute by Age. Houses unique Mongol technologies.
Constructing a new Ovoo will destroy the prior one.
variations.descriptionCN:
必须建在石料露头上。
随着时代提升，每分钟采集 70/100/120/150 石料。可研究独特蒙古科技。
建造新敖包会摧毁旧有的敖包。
influences:
Buildings within the influence of the Ovoo can spend Stone on improved production items:
- Unit production produces two units instead of one.
- Researches have improved effect.
- Pastures produce sheep faster.
influencesCN:
在敖包影响范围内的建筑可花费石料来换取强化生产项目：
- 生产单位时从生产一个单位变为两个单位。
- 研究效果加强。
- 牧场生产绵羊的速度加快。

Unique Landmark fortification for the Knights Templar, can be fully destroyed.
Has an aura that improves nearby units range.
Each Fortress increases the number of Pilgrims travelling.
variations.descriptionCN:
圣殿骑士团独特的地标防御工事，可以被完全摧毁。
拥有可以提升附近单位射程的光环。
每拥有一座要塞都可以增加踏上旅途的朝圣者数量。
influences: The Templar Headquarters and Fortresses grant Stone Walls in influence +25% health and an arrowslit emplacement.
influencesCN: 圣殿骑士团司令部和要塞可以令影响范围内石墙的生命值 +25% 和一个射箭槽炮台。

data.name: Harbor
data.description:
Strong Dock that produces naval units and increases the health of nearby ships.
Automatically repairs nearby damaged naval units.
Capable of holding up to 4 Fishing Ships.

variations.name: Harbor
variations.description:
Strong Dock that produces naval units and increases the health of nearby ships.
Automatically repairs nearby damaged naval units.
Capable of holding up to 4 Fishing Ships.
variations.descriptionCN:
强大的码头，可生产海军单位并增加附近船只的生命值。
自动修复附近受损的海军单位。
最多可容纳 4 艘渔船。
displayClassesCN: 军事和经济建筑、交易站

data.name: Runestones
data.description: Carve a Runestone after defeating 5 military units to celebrate honorable victories in combat, enhancing Varangian ranged weapons by 1 tile, melee damage by 1, and move speed by 15%. Lasts 150 seconds.

variations.name: Runestones
variations.description: Carve a Runestone after defeating 5 military units to celebrate honorable victories in combat, enhancing Varangian ranged weapons by 1 tile, melee damage by 1, and move speed by 15%. Lasts 150 seconds.
variations.descriptionCN: 在击败 5 个军事单位后雕刻符文石，以庆祝战斗中的光荣胜利，使瓦兰吉远程武器 +1 格，近战伤害 +1，移动速度 +15%。持续 150 秒。

data.name: Varangian Arsenal
data.description: Houses advanced technology for the Macedonian Dynasty.

variations.name: Varangian Arsenal
variations.description: Houses advanced technology for the Macedonian Dynasty.
variations.descriptionCN: 推动马其顿王朝的科技发展。
influences: Mining Camps and Town Centers within the influence of a Varangian Arsenal begin generating an additional 12% of Silver every minute based off the total Silver deposited at the influenced mine.
influencesCN: 对于在瓦兰吉兵工厂影响范围内的采矿场和城镇中心，每分钟开始根据受影响矿场的白银总储量额外产生 12% 的白银。

data.name: Varangian Stronghold
data.description: Structure capable of producing any Varangian unit.

variations.name: Varangian Stronghold
variations.description: Structure capable of producing any Varangian unit.
variations.descriptionCN: 能够生产任何瓦兰吉单位的建筑。

data.name: Varangian Warcamp
data.description:
Increases your maximum Population.
 
As the Empire suffers casualties in war, the emperor calls forth more Varangians. 
Once enough troops are lost in battle, the selected Varangian is reinforced to the battlefield at no cost. If placed on shore near water, Attack Ships or Galleys become available as reinforcements.
 
Reinforcements cost 6 times their value in fallen warriors.

variations.name: Varangian Warcamp
variations.description:
Increases your maximum Population.
 
As the Empire suffers casualties in war, the emperor calls forth more Varangians. 
Once enough troops are lost in battle, the selected Varangian is reinforced to the battlefield at no cost. If placed on shore near water, Attack Ships or Galleys become available as reinforcements.
 
Reinforcements cost 6 times their value in fallen warriors.
variations.descriptionCN:
提高你的人口上限。
随着帝国在战争中伤亡加剧，皇帝便会召集更多瓦兰吉人。
一旦在战斗中损失的部队数量足够多，选定的瓦兰吉人将在不消耗任何资源的情况下被增援到战场上。如果将其安置在近水岸边，攻击船或箭船可成为增援力量。
援军在阵亡战士身上花费 6 倍的成本。

data.name: Cattle Ranch
data.description: Cattle garrisoned in this ranch generate +25 Food per minute. This value is increased by the food upgrades.

variations.name: Cattle Ranch
variations.description: Cattle garrisoned in this ranch generate +25 Food per minute. This value is increased by the food upgrades.
variations.descriptionCN: 放置于此牧场的牛每分钟产生 +25 食物。这个值会随着食物升级而增加。

data.name: Farimba Garrison
data.description: Enlist one of three units to enhance your roster: the Mansa Musofadi, Mansa Javelineer, or Freeborn Warrior. Another unit can be enlisted in the Imperial Age.

variations.name: Farimba Garrison
variations.description: Enlist one of three units to enhance your roster: the Mansa Musofadi, Mansa Javelineer, or Freeborn Warrior. Another unit can be enlisted in the Imperial Age.
variations.descriptionCN: 从以下三种单位中招募其一来强化你的军队：曼萨·穆索法迪、曼萨掷枪手或自由民战士。在帝国时代还可以招募另一种单位。

data.name: Fort of the Huntress
data.description:
Acts as a Keep that shoots poison arrows. Infantry units nearby the Landmark enter Stealth for 30 seconds.
Musofadi Warriors and Musofadi Gunners gain First Strike, dealing more damage when breaking Stealth with an attack.

variations.name: Fort of the Huntress

variations.descriptionCN:

data.name: Griot Bara
data.description: Begin a festival for 300 Gold, providing global enhancements to Food gather rates, unit production speeds, or damage of torches and siege attacks. One festival may be active at a time.

data.name: Pit Mine
data.description:
Must be built on a Gold Vein.
Mines 36 Gold per minute without depleting the deposit. If a deposit has been depleted, the Pit Mine can be re-placed on exhausted Gold Veins.

variations.name: Pit Mine
variations.description:
Must be built on a Gold Vein.
Mines 36 Gold per minute without depleting the deposit. If a deposit has been depleted, the Pit Mine can be re-placed on exhausted Gold Veins.
variations.descriptionCN:
必须建造在黄金矿脉上。
每分钟可开采  36 份黄金，而且不会耗尽金矿。若金矿已消耗殆尽，露天矿区可以被重新放置在枯竭的黄金矿脉上。
influences: The Gold extraction rate of Open Pit Mines is increased by +25% for each House or Mining Camp built within the influence.
influencesCN: 在露天矿区的影响范围内每建造一座房屋或一座采矿场，露天矿区的开采速率 +25%。

data.name: Saharan Trade Network
data.description:
Acts as a Toll Outpost that comes with Defensive Javelin Emplacement researched. Unlocks Javelin Emplacement for Outposts.
All Traders and Trade Ships taxed will generate Food equal to the taxed Gold at this Landmark. All other Toll Outposts will generate 50% of taxed Gold as Food.

variations.name: Saharan Trade Network
variations.description:
Acts as a Toll Outpost that comes with Defensive Javelin Emplacement researched. Unlocks Javelin Emplacement for Outposts.
All Traders and Trade Ships taxed will generate Food equal to the taxed Gold at this Landmark. All other Toll Outposts will generate 50% of taxed Gold as Food.
variations.descriptionCN:
可作为已研究防御型标枪炮台的收费哨站使用。为哨站解锁标枪炮台。
所有被征税的商人以及商船都会在此地标处生产与税金等值的食物，其他所有收费哨站也会生产相当于税金 50% 的食物。

data.name: Toll Outpost
data.description:
Offers extensive line of sight and detects units stealth or disguises. Can be upgraded with weaponry and fortifications. Attacks while garrisoned.
Passing Traders and Trade Ships instantly provide an additional 8% of their carried Gold. Does not generate any bonus tax if a toll outpost is built within range of another one.

variations.name: Toll Outpost
variations.description:
Offers extensive line of sight and detects units stealth or disguises. Can be upgraded with weaponry and fortifications. Attacks while garrisoned.
Passing Traders and Trade Ships instantly provide an additional 8% of their carried Gold. Does not generate any bonus tax if a toll outpost is built within range of another one.
variations.descriptionCN:
可提供开阔的视野，侦测匿踪或伪装单元。可升级武器和防御工事。单位驻扎时可进行攻击。
经过的商人和商船可立即额外提供其所携带黄金的 8%。收费哨站建在另一座收费哨站的范围内时，不会产生任何奖金税。

data.name: Pasture
data.description: Automatically produces a gatherable Sheep every 140 seconds. Will eventually stop producing if too many Sheep are produced and not gathered.

Buildings within the influence of the Ovoo can spend Stone on improved production items:

在敖包影响范围内的建筑可花费石料来换取强化生产项目：
